  • Polymer

  • VanillaJS

entry.title: HAXEditor
entry.summary: HAXeditor is a revolutionary new way of editing content. It's a block editor that can be extended by simply extending the web.Waxam experts can help you...Implement HAXEditor in your organizationCr
entry.content:
HAXeditor is a revolutionary new way of editing content. It's a block editor that can be extended by simply extending the web.

Waxam experts can help you...

  • Implement HAXEditor in your organization
  • Create new elements for the HAXeditor
  • Teach you how to make the most of your web development with Web components that work in HAXeditor

entry.title: HAXcms
entry.summary: HAXcms is a distributed publishing solution that requires minimal backend to setup and then no backend to power published sites.This workflow makes it ridiculously fast and secure without compromisin
entry.content:
HAXcms is a distributed publishing solution that requires minimal backend to setup and then no backend to power published sites.

This workflow makes it ridiculously fast and secure without compromising on features.

WaxaM are experts in implementation, integration, extending and making recommendations about the HAXcms platform

What we can provide

  • Implementation optimizations
  • Trainings on using and building themes for HAXcms
  • Best practices

entry.title: About Waxam
entry.summary: WaxaMWe're here to flip the industry on its head. Forward, backward, upside-down; WaxaM is built to survive any sea change.Boldness or blindness in that statement?We're here to build a platform t
entry.content:
WaxaM

We're here to flip the industry on its head. Forward, backward, upside-down; WaxaM is built to survive any sea change.

Boldness or blindness in that statement?

We're here to build a platform that enhances the open web and makes it fundamentally more sustainable, leveraging the web components standard.

We're here to empower authors, bloggers, developers, anyone involved in the web to deliver a faster, more accessible, and fundamentally better product.

Do you care about the open web?

Do you want to eliminate platform lock in?

Do you want to build website without having to think about it so much?

Do you care about permanence, portability, and data privacy?

Then we're building a platform and solutions for you. Built on top of the power open source projects HAXiam, HAXcms and HAXeditor, Waxam is your one stop for all things training and support related in the HAX ecosystem. Our experts live sleep and breath HAX related solutions and we can help you get started today.

contact: info@waxam.io
